channel.description: Recent content in General-Store on Wheeler Genealogy

item.title: From Farm to Storefront: Augustus Tuttle and the A. & O. S. Tuttle Store
item.description: A census snapshot shows Augustus Tuttle as a young farmer in Vermont, but later evidence points to a family business: a Cavendish general store that became a Holyoke dry-goods operation.

item.title: What Was A. & O. S. Tuttle? A Research Note on the Cavendish Store and Holyoke Dry Goods
item.description: Evidence points to a Tuttle brothers’ store in Cavendish (1857) that later moved to Holyoke (1863) and shifted to dry goods. This post documents the trail and next steps.
